verses.roman:
yad yad bhagavatā dattam
ādhipatyaṁ sva-siddhaye
sarvaṁ pratyarpayām āsur
harau bhūmi-gate nṛpa

synonyms: yat yat—whatever; bhagavatā—by the Supreme Lord; dattam—given; ādhipatyam—delegated power of control; sva—their own; siddhaye—for facilitating the exercise of authority; sarvam—all; pratyarpayām āsuḥ—they offered back; harau—to Kṛṣṇa; bhūmi—to the earth; gate—come; nṛpa—O King (Parīkṣit).
translation: The Supreme Lord having come to the earth, O King, these demigods now offered Him whatever powers of control He had previously delegated to them for the exercise of their particular authority.
